meanings.sent1: The biyearly school fair is always a fun event for the students.
meanings.sent2: The biyearly dentist appointments are important for maintaining good oral health.
meanings.sent3: The biyearly family reunion is a great opportunity to catch up with relatives.
meanings.sent4: The biyearly changing of seasons brings a sense of renewal and change.
meanings.sent5: The biyearly salary increase was a welcome surprise for the employees.

meanings.sent1: The company holds biyearly meetings to discuss long-term goals.
meanings.sent2: The biyearly elections determine the leadership for the next two years.
meanings.sent3: The biyearly maintenance of the building keeps it in top condition.
meanings.sent4: The biyearly migration of birds is a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The biyearly performance review helps employees track their progress.
